DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect transvenous vagus nerve stimulation ( tVNS ) immune response . In human endotoxemia model , intravenously administer endotoxin ( lipopolysaccharide [ LPS ] ) elicit systemic immune response release pro-inflammatory cytokine , TNF α . This trial determine anti-inflammatory effect produce acute VNS use minimally invasive delivery method .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Transvenous Vagus Nerve Stimulation Immune Response : Pilot Study
